title: InoBat begins making battery cells in Slovakia
notes:
Location:
- The battery production project is located in Voderady, Slovakia.

Capacity:
- The pilot line has been launched and is operational, with 35 machines covering the entire production process. The annual capacity of the joint venture Gotion InoBat Batteries (GIB) factory is planned to be 20 gigawatt-hours, with a potential to double to 40 GWh. Additionally, InoBat is planning a 100 MWh pilot production facility and a 10 GWh factory in the future.

Investment amounts:
- The specific investment amounts are not provided in the given information.

Project progress:
- The pilot line has been launched, and the joint venture GIB factory is scheduled to start production in the second quarter of 2026, with series production in 2027. InoBat is also planning additional pilot production facilities and a 10 GWh factory in the future.

Project type:
- The project involves the construction of a new battery production facility in Voderady, Slovakia.

Value chain stages:
- The facility covers the entire production process from preparing anode and cathode mixtures to final formation and ageing, utilizing high-speed layering technology. This includes cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly.

title: Slovakian Company InoBat and Ideanomics Secure Incentives for Joint Venture Battery R&D and ProductionFacility in Indiana
notes:
Location:
- The project is located in Indiana, United States.

Capacity:
- The planned capacity of the facility is 2-3 GWh per year, with construction expected to begin in Q1 of 2023 and assembly to start in 2024.

Investment amounts:
- InoBat has raised and committed EUR91m from convertible loans, equity financing, EU, and governmental funds. The Indiana Economic Development Corporation (IEDC) has offered an attractive incentive package consisting of tax credits, abatements, cash grants, and training aid.

Project progress:
- The construction of the facility is expected to begin in Q1 of 2023, with assembly to start in 2024. The project has secured necessary regional incentives and is a joint venture with Ideanomics.

Project type:
- The project is a new build, with a planned 100,000-square-foot battery module and pack assembly and R&D facility.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover battery module and pack assembly and R&D, showcasing a "cradle-to-cradle" approach, which emphasizes the concept of a circular economy.

title: InoBat Auto and Ideanomics reveal plans to build R&D and battery production facilities in Indiana, USA, supported by the State of Indiana
notes:
Location:
- The project is located in Indiana, USA.

Capacity:
- The initial annual production capacity of the battery module and pack assembly plant is 100 MWh, with plans to expand to a 2-3 GWh yearly production capacity for the full commercial-scale battery module and pack assembly plant. There is also an exploration of constructing a tailor-made battery cell production facility with an initial 4 GWh annual capacity.

Investment amounts:
- The specific capital invested or announced for the project is not provided in the articles. However, the State of Indiana is providing support, including potential incentive packages, administrative, advisory, fiscal, and site location support.

Project progress:
- The project is in the phase of planning and initial investment. The partnership between InoBat Auto and Ideanomics is focused on opening an R&D and production facility for battery module and pack assembly, with plans for subsequent construction of a full commercial-scale battery module and pack assembly plant.

Project type:
- The project involves the construction of a new battery module and pack R&D and prototype-volume production facility, as well as a full commercial-scale battery module and pack assembly plant.

Value chain stages:
- The facility covers the stages of battery module and pack assembly, and there are plans to explore the construction of a tailor-made battery cell production facility.

Note: The specific investment amounts and subsidies are not provided in the articles.

title: InoBat to build battery gigafactory in western Europe
notes:
Location:
- The planned factory will be located in Western Europe, with a decision on the specific location to be made this year. The company also mentioned the EU and the UK as potential locations.

Capacity:
- The company plans to acquire the first 4 GWh module of the 32 GWh project. Additionally, there are plans for a 100 MWh pilot production facility in Voderady and a 10 GWh factory from 2024.

Investment amounts:
- The investment of an unspecified amount from Ideanomics is intended to support the completion of the R&D centre and the pilot battery plant by the end of 2022. Other investors include Rio Tinto, Amara Raja, and the World Bank’s private arm, the IFC.

Project progress:
- The company is in the process of making a decision on the specific location for the factory. It has also restructured its board, with the chairman being replaced by Andy Palmer. The company is recruiting its board of directors.

Project type:
- The project is a new build gigafactory.

Value chain stages:
- The facility plans to cover cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly. Additionally, the company has announced a collaboration with Gigamine for battery recycling.
